targets.expr:
# 95th percentile KV Request Duration
histogram_quantile(
  0.95,
  sum(rate(loki_kv_request_duration_seconds_bucket[$__rate_interval])) by (le)
)

# 95th percentile Index Request Duration
histogram_quantile(
  0.95,
  sum(rate(loki_index_request_duration_seconds_bucket[$__rate_interval])) by (le)
)

# 95th percentile Ingester Client Request Duration
histogram_quantile(
  0.95,
  sum(rate(loki_ingester_client_request_duration_seconds_bucket[$__rate_interval])) by (le)
)

panels.title: batch appends sent to ingesters / sec
